description: ENHANCING HUMAN SECURITY IN THE CHERNOBYL AFFECTED AREAS OF BELARUS

subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
subproject.description: Develop new approaches to improve income security, minimize radiation exposure and practice healthy lifestyles in the concerned project communities of Slavgorod, Chechersk, Bragin, Stolin and Luninets Districts affected by Chernobyl disaster.
subproject.title: ENHANCING HUMAN SECURITY IN CH
